segments.text: I notice the boy's determination as he stretches toward the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost comical how focused he is on getting those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But then I see the stool tipping, and my heart drops a little.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What if he falls? The sound would be awful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, his sister stands there with her hand out, practically begging for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Thereâ€™s an innocence about them that stirs something nostalgic in me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet, it feels wrong to watch them sneak around like this, unnoticed by their mother.
segments.speaker: PAR
